name: Police vs Gangster Escape: Car
description:
Police vs Gangster Escape: Car Racing is the best police and gangster chase game with the fun of driving city police auto cars, evading danger and enjoying the threat of death after bank robbery, keep on racing through destructive road obstacles and dangerous 3D city roads! Show guts to raise the top of notorious criminal piles in crazy police car escape plan game.
Features*
• Realistic police siren sounds and HD graphics
• Dodge the cars, buses and trucks on the highway
• Thrill of driving, chasing and arresting the criminals
• Realistic car driving and chasing simulator
• Be a duty police driver in this free police driving games
